00091     template <class T>
00092     class ParamDescription : public AbstractParamDescription
00093     {
00094     public:
00095       ParamDescription(std::string name, std::string type, uint32_t level, 
00096           std::string description, std::string edit_method, T drive_managerConfig::* f) :
00097         AbstractParamDescription(name, type, level, description, edit_method),
00098         field(f)
00099       {}
00100 
00101       T (drive_managerConfig::* field);
00102 
00103       virtual void clamp(drive_managerConfig &config, const drive_managerConfig &max, const drive_managerConfig &min) const
00104       {
00105         if (config.*field > max.*field)
00106           config.*field = max.*field;
00107         
00108         if (config.*field < min.*field)
00109           config.*field = min.*field;
00110       }
00111 
00112       virtual void calcLevel(uint32_t &comb_level, const drive_managerConfig &config1, const drive_managerConfig &config2) const
00113       {
00114         if (config1.*field != config2.*field)
00115           comb_level |= level;
00116       }
00117 
00118       virtual void fromServer(const ros::NodeHandle &nh, drive_managerConfig &config) const
00119       {
00120         nh.getParam(name, config.*field);
00121       }
00122 
00123       virtual void toServer(const ros::NodeHandle &nh, const drive_managerConfig &config) const
00124       {
00125         nh.setParam(name, config.*field);
00126       }
00127 
00128       virtual bool fromMessage(const dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, drive_managerConfig &config) const
00129       {
00130         return dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::getParameter(msg, name, config.*field);
00131       }
00132 
00133       virtual void toMessage(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, const drive_managerConfig &config) const
00134       {
00135         dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::appendParameter(msg, name, config.*field);
00136       }

00138       virtual void getValue(const drive_managerConfig &config, boost::any &val) const
00139       {
00140         val = config.*field;

00177     template<class T, class PT>
00178     class GroupDescription : public AbstractGroupDescription
00179     {
00180     public:
00181       GroupDescription(std::string name, std::string type, int parent, int id, bool s, T PT::* f) : AbstractGroupDescription(name, type, parent, id, s), field(f)
00182       {
00183       }
00184 
00185       GroupDescription(const GroupDescription<T, PT>& g): AbstractGroupDescription(g.name, g.type, g.parent, g.id, g.state), field(g.field), groups(g.groups)
00186       {
00187         parameters = g.parameters;
00188         abstract_parameters = g.abstract_parameters;
00189       }
00190 
00191       virtual bool fromMessage(const dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, boost::any &cfg) const
00192       {
00193         PT* config = boost::any_cast<PT*>(cfg);
00194         if(!dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::getGroupState(msg, name, (*config).*field))
00195           return false;
00196         
00197         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++) 
00198         {
00199           boost::any n = &((*config).*field);
00200           if(!(*i)->fromMessage(msg, n))
00201             return false;
00202         }
00203 
00204         return true;
00205       }
00206 
00207       virtual void setInitialState(boost::any &cfg) const
00208       {
00209         PT* config = boost::any_cast<PT*>(cfg);
00210         T* group = &((*config).*field);
00211         group->state = state;
00212 
00213         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++)
00214         {
00215           boost::any n = boost::any(&((*config).*field));
00216           (*i)->setInitialState(n);
00217         }
00218 
00219       }
00220       
00221       virtual void updateParams(boost::any &cfg, drive_managerConfig &top) const
00222       {
00223         PT* config = boost::any_cast<PT*>(cfg);
00224 
00225         T* f = &((*config).*field);
00226         f->setParams(top, abstract_parameters);
00227 
00228         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++) 
00229         {
00230           boost::any n = &((*config).*field);

00232         }
00233       }
00234 
00235       virtual void toMessage(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, const boost::any &cfg) const
00236       {
00237         const PT config = boost::any_cast<PT>(cfg);
00238         dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::appendGroup<T>(msg, name, id, parent, config.*field);
00239 
00240         for(std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = groups.begin(); i != groups.end(); i++)
00241         {
00242           (*i)->toMessage(msg, config.*field);
00243         }
00244       }

00259     void setParams(drive_managerConfig &config, const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> params)
00260     {
00261       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = params.begin(); i != params.end(); i++)
00262       {
00263         boost::any val;
00264         (*i)->getValue(config, val);
00265 
00266         if("Max_Speed"==(*i)->name){Max_Speed = boost::any_cast<double>(val);}
00267         if("Linear_Velocity"==(*i)->name){Linear_Velocity = boost::any_cast<double>(val);}
00268       }
00269     }

00288     bool __fromMessage__(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg)
00289     {
00290       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00291       const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__ = __getGroupDescriptions__();
00292 
00293       int count = 0;
00294       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00295         if ((*i)->fromMessage(msg, *this))
00296           count++;
00297 
00298       for (std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __group_descriptions__.begin(); i != __group_descriptions__.end(); i ++)
00299       {
00300         if ((*i)->id == 0)
00301         {
00302           boost::any n = boost::any(this);
00303           (*i)->updateParams(n, *this);
00304           (*i)->fromMessage(msg, n);
00305         }
00306       }
00307 
00308       if (count != dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::size(msg))
00309       {
00310         ROS_ERROR("drive_managerConfig::__fromMessage__ called with an unexpected parameter.");
00311         ROS_ERROR("Booleans:");
00312         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.bools.size(); i++)
00313           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.bools[i].name.c_str());
00314         ROS_ERROR("Integers:");
00315         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.ints.size(); i++)
00316           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.ints[i].name.c_str());
00317         ROS_ERROR("Doubles:");
00318         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.doubles.size(); i++)
00319           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.doubles[i].name.c_str());
00320         ROS_ERROR("Strings:");
00321         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < msg.strs.size(); i++)
00322           ROS_ERROR("  %s", msg.strs[i].name.c_str());
00323         // @todo Check that there are no duplicates. Make this error more
00324         // explicit.
00325         return false;
00326       }
00327       return true;
00328     }

00330     // This version of __toMessage__ is used during initialization of
00331     // statics when __getParamDescriptions__ can't be called yet.
00332     void __toMessage__(dynamic_reconfigure::Config &msg, const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__, const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__) const
00333     {
00334       dynamic_reconfigure::ConfigTools::clear(msg);
00335       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00336         (*i)->toMessage(msg, *this);
00337 
00338       for (std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __group_descriptions__.begin(); i != __group_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00339       {
00340         if((*i)->id == 0)
00341         {
00342           (*i)->toMessage(msg, *this);
00343         }
00344       }
00345     }

00361     void __fromServer__(const ros::NodeHandle &nh)
00362     {
00363       static bool setup=false;
00364 
00365       const std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr> &__param_descriptions__ = __getParamDescriptions__();
00366       for (std::vector<AbstractParamDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __param_descriptions__.begin(); i != __param_descriptions__.end(); i++)
00367         (*i)->fromServer(nh, *this);
00368 
00369       const std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr> &__group_descriptions__ = __getGroupDescriptions__();
00370       for (std::vector<AbstractGroupDescriptionConstPtr>::const_iterator i = __group_descriptions__.begin(); i != __group_descriptions__.end(); i++){
00371         if (!setup && (*i)->id == 0) {
00372           setup = true;
00373           boost::any n = boost::any(this);
00374           (*i)->setInitialState(n);
00375         }
00376       }
00377     }

00389     {

00462     static const drive_managerConfigStatics *get_instance()
00463     {
00464       // Split this off in a separate function because I know that
00465       // instance will get initialized the first time get_instance is
00466       // called, and I am guaranteeing that get_instance gets called at
00467       // most once.
00468       static drive_managerConfigStatics instance;
00469       return &instance;
00470     }

00503   inline const drive_managerConfigStatics *drive_managerConfig::__get_statics__()
00504   {
00505     const static drive_managerConfigStatics *statics;
00506   
00507     if (statics) // Common case
00508       return statics;
00509 
00510     boost::mutex::scoped_lock lock(dynamic_reconfigure::__init_mutex__);
00511 
00512     if (statics) // In case we lost a race.
00513       return statics;
00514 
00515     statics = drive_managerConfigStatics::get_instance();
00516     
00517     return statics;
00518   }
